metadata.title: CVE-2022-31117 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: UltraJSON is a fast JSON encoder and decoder written in pure C withbindings for Python 3.7+. In versions prior to 5.4.0 an error occurringwhile reallocating a buffer for string decoding can cause the buffer to getfreed twice. Due to how UltraJSON uses the internal decoder, this doublefree is impossible to trigger from Python. This issue has been resolved inversion 5.4.0 and all users should upgrade to UltraJSON 5.4.0. There are noknown workarounds for this issue.

criterions.comment: ujson: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
pandas: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
